snippet.title: Dragonyhm Pre Order Trailer - ModRetro Chromatic, Game Boy, Game Boy Color
snippet.description:
Dragonyhm is a brand new indie RPG releasing in Q4 2024 for ModRetro Chromatic, also compatible with Game Boy and Game Boy Color. 

Pre order now to secure your copy! https://modretro.com/products/dragonyhm 

​Experience an epic tale set in a vivid fantasy world, all on your favourite retro handheld console!

For a number of years after the age-old conflict with dragons came to a head, the people of Archend have enjoyed an era of peace.

All was well until the esteemed Yhmszindr, Kurtis, went missing, and the sealed dragons began to awaken.

​Explore, solve, and battle your way through this heroic adventure, meeting memorable characters while uncovering the rich history of the land of Archend.

Step into this world as Kris, son of the Yhmszindr, embarking on a quest to find him. Along the way, put a stop to the plot that threatens the kingdom!​


Features: 

- 9 main dungeons, with a multitude of mini-dungeons.
- Turn-based battles, real-time action, puzzles and mini-games.
- Unlockable modifiers and collectible extras.
- Multiple endings.
- An immersive fantasy world.


@ModRetroHub
